sections.title: Assassin (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Assassin class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Table: Assassin (Assassin)
sections.description: Level progression table showing assassin base attack bonus, saves, and special abilities gained at each level from 1st to 10th.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Assassin)
sections.description: Assassins are proficient with specific weapons (crossbows, daggers, darts, rapier, sap, shortbows, short sword) and light armor but not shields.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Assassin)
sections.description: Functions like rogue sneak attack, dealing extra damage that increases by +1d6 every other level, stacking with sneak attack from other sources.

sections.title: Death Attack (Ex) (Assassin)
sections.description: After studying a target for 3 rounds, the assassin can make a sneak attack that kills or paralyzes the target unless they succeed a Fortitude save.

sections.title: Poison Use (Assassin)
sections.description: Assassins cannot accidentally poison themselves when applying poison to weapons.

sections.title: Save Bonus against Poison (Assassin)
sections.description: Gains increasing saving throw bonuses against poison, starting at +1 at 2nd level and increasing by +1 every two levels.

sections.title: Uncanny Dodge (Ex) (Assassin)
sections.description: Cannot be caught flat-footed, even against invisible attackers, but can still lose Dex bonus to AC from immobilization or feinting.

sections.title: Hidden Weapons (Ex) (Assassin)
sections.description: Adds assassin level to Sleight of Hand checks made to conceal weapons on the body.

sections.title: True Death (Su) (Assassin)
sections.description: Creatures killed by death attack are harder to resurrect, requiring caster level checks or remove curse to negate the effect.

sections.title: Improved Uncanny Dodge (Ex) (Assassin)
sections.description: Cannot be flanked, denying rogues sneak attacks from flanking unless they have 4+ more rogue levels than the assassin has assassin levels.

sections.title: Quiet Death (Ex) (Assassin)
sections.description: When killing with death attack during surprise round, can make Stealth check to avoid being identified as the killer.

sections.title: Hide in Plain Sight (Su) (Assassin)
sections.description: Can use Stealth while observed if within 10 feet of shadow, but cannot hide in own shadow.

sections.title: Swift Death (Ex) (Assassin)
sections.description: Once per day, can make a death attack without the normal 3 rounds of study, but must still sneak attack with a melee weapon.

sections.title: Angel of Death (Su) (Assassin)
sections.description: Once per day on successful death attack, can cause target's body to crumble to dust, preventing raise dead and resurrection but not true resurrection.
